text: Hurricane Gladys was the first Atlantic hurricane to be observed each by the Hurricane Hunters, radar imagery, and photographs from space. The seventh named storm and fifth hurricane of the 1968 season, Gladys formed on October 13 in the western Caribbean from a broad disturbance related to a tropical wave. == Related pages == * 1968 Atlantic Hurricane season * Hurricanes in Florida Category:Category 1 Atlantic hurricanes Category:Hurricanes in Florida Category:Natural disasters in Canada Category:1960s in Cuba Category:1960s in Canada Category:1968 in the United States Category:October events Category:1960s in weather
title: Hurricane Gladys (1968)
